QuestData.Title: The Nightborne Prince
QuestData.Description: <Senegos is focused.>$b$bI sense it now. In the ruined building, to the east. One of these cretins must have tapped deep into the ley line.$b$bI suspect he will be heavily defended, $n. Once again, the well-being of my brood is in your hands.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He's been pestering you from atop his ruins. Maybe it's time to pay him a visit...
QuestData.RewardText: He may not be slain, but at least he is gone.$b$bWithout their leader, the mindless withered should soon scatter and die.
